base_description: Black rectangular remote control with buttons.
part_description: Contains numerous small, round buttons arranged in rows on the front. Includes a larger button at the top and a rectangular panel at the bottom.
internal_interaction_description: The buttons interact with internal circuits to send signals. Pressing a button closes a circuit, allowing the remote to transmit a specific signal corresponding to the button pressed.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with electronic devices like TVs or stereos by sending infrared signals. Users press buttons to control device functions such as power, volume, and channel selection.
